an6.111:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these three things. What three? () The sensual element, (2) the element of ill will, and (3) the element of harming. These are three things. Threeotherthings are to be developed for abandoning these three things. What three? (4) The element of renunciation is to be developed for abandoning the sensual element. (5) The element of good will is to be developed for abandoning the element of ill will. (6) The element of harmlessness is to be developed for abandoning the element of harming. These three things are to be developed for abandoning the former three things."
